code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[recipes,setRecipes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:3000/recipes').then(response=>setRecipes(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching recipes:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"foodieshare"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Welcome to foodieshare"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"We Have a lot of Recipes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/recipe-details",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{fontSize:'1.2em',margin:'10px'},children:"Recipes Detail"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/recipe-list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{fontSize:'1.1em',margin:'10px'},children:"Recipe List"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:recipes.map(recipe=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/recipe/${recipe._id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:recipe.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Description:"})," ",recipe.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Ingredients:"})," ",recipe.ingredients]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Steps:"})," ",recipe.steps]})]},recipe._id))})]});};export default Home;
